ComicInfo.Summary:
Wake the Devil [Chapter One]: The base of the recently revived Nazi scientists Kroenen, Haupstein, and Von Krupt in Norway is broached by Roderick Zinco, who tells them of a visitation by Rasputin and pledges the resources of the Zinco Corporation to the renewal of Project Ragna Rok. One year later, a briefing at BPRD headquarters in Fairfield recaps the history of suspected vampire Vladimir Giurescu, his ties to Project Ragna Rok, and the possible abduction of his body from a museum in New York City. Hellboy and five other agents are sent to Romania to locate Castle Giurescu before his body can be reanimated.
Silent as the Grave [Part 1]: "Until the Daybreak, and the Shadows Flee Away": The famed macabre moviemaker Lawrence St. George has called Police Inspector Lava to his studio to screen a scene from his latest film, in which a mysterious spectral figure not present in the negatives has appeared. Meanwhile, Julia Adler, star of the film and murder suspect, surfaces after three days on a remote road asking for St. George. The director is then approached, amidst a throng of reporters that includes the intrepid Sunset Lane, by a strange man named Crulk holding a shoebox.
